name: Greedent
description: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.

abilities.name: Greedy Tail
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Pokémon Tool card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
